title: Employee CRUD Operations with Excel Import/Export
description: Verify that employee create, read, update, and delete operations work correctly including bulk processing and Excel import/export, ensuring data integrity.

steps.description: Login as HR specialist with valid credentials
Navigate to Employees management page
Create a new employee with valid data
Verify that the new employee appears in the employee list with correct data
Update employee details and save changes
Verify that employee details are updated correctly
Delete an employee
Verify that the employee is removed from the list
Upload an Excel file with multiple valid employee records for bulk import
Verify all employees from the Excel file are imported accurately
Export current employee data to Excel
Verify exported Excel file contains all employee data with correct format
Attempt to import Excel file with invalid/malformed employee data
Verify system rejects invalid entries and shows proper error messages without importing invalid data

title: Dynamic Shift Planning with Conflict Detection and Multi-location Support
description: Validate the dynamic creation, conflict detection, approval, and multi-location support in shift planning module.

steps.description: Login as shift manager
Navigate to Shift Planning page
Create a shift for a specific location and group
Verify the shift appears correctly on the calendar with location and group info
Create another shift with overlapping time and same employee/group
Verify conflict detection triggers warning or blocks the shift creation
Approve a newly created shift
Verify shift status updates to approved and locking rules apply if any
Create shifts across multiple locations for the same employees
Verify shifts are correctly assigned per location and no conflicts occur if times do not overlap
Attempt to create shift with invalid data or unauthorized user
Verify proper error or access denied responses

title: Attendance Tracking via QR Code and Manual Input
description: Test attendance tracking functionality including QR code scanning, GPS location capture, manual entries, anomaly detection, and automatic overtime calculations.

steps.description: Login as employee
Check in using QR code scanning with valid one-time token and GPS coordinates
Verify attendance record is created with valid timestamp and GPS data
Manually enter attendance check-in time for a day
Check that manual entry is recorded correctly and flagged if out of expected time range
Check out via QR code with valid token
Verify proper check-out time is recorded and overtime is calculated if applicable
Attempt to check-in/out with expired or reused QR code token
Verify system rejects invalid tokens and no attendance is recorded
Generate anomaly by missing check-out or double check-ins
Verify anomaly detection flags these cases and notifications are created for supervisors

title: Annual Leave Management with Labor Law Compliance and Carry-over Logic
description: Validate annual leave request submission, approval, automatic calculation according to labor laws, carry-over limits, and usage tracking.

steps.description: Login as employee
Submit annual leave request with valid date range
Verify leave request status is pending and appears in manager's approval panel
Login as manager and approve an annual leave request
Check leave request status updates to approved and leave balances are adjusted accordingly
Simulate year-end carry-over process with excess leave days
Verify leave days are carried over to next year respecting maximum allowed limits by labor law
Attempt to request leave exceeding remaining balance
Verify system rejects request with appropriate validation error

title: Service Route Planning and Passenger Management
description: Verify creation, editing, and management of service routes, stops, and passenger lists including quick route and manual route entries.

steps.description: Login as service manager
Create a new service route with multiple stops
Verify route and stops are displayed correctly in the services page
Add passengers to a service route
Verify passenger list updates and passenger management functionalities are correct
Edit route details and save changes
Verify route changes are saved and reflected in route overview
Delete a stop from a route
Check stop is removed without affecting the integrity of the route

title: Job Application Process with 7-Section Form and HR Review Panel
description: Test the public multi-section job application form, CV upload functionality, and secure HR panel for reviewing and tracking application statuses.

steps.description: Access public job application form
Complete all seven sections correctly with valid inputs
Upload a valid CV document
Submit the job application
Verify submission success notification and database records are created
Login to HR panel as HR staff
Review submitted applications, view CV attachments, and update application statuses
Verify status changes are saved and reflected properly
Attempt to submit application with missing mandatory fields
Verify validation errors prevent submission

title: Real-Time Dashboard Metrics and Notifications
description: Validate real-time update of dashboard KPIs, charts, personnel statuses, shift summaries, and notification delivery with priority and read/unread filtering.

steps.description: Login as admin or manager
Navigate to dashboard page
Verify real-time statistics, charts, and key performance indicators are displayed and updated correctly
Trigger an event that sends a system notification
Verify notification appears with correct priority and timestamp in notification panel
Mark notification as read
Verify notification changes state and filtering hides or shows accordingly

title: Calendar Scheduling with Drag & Drop and Mobile Optimization
description: Test calendar event creation, editing with drag & drop, filtering functionality, and responsiveness on mobile devices.

steps.description: Login and open calendar page
Create a calendar event for shift or leave
Verify event appears correctly in calendar view
Use drag & drop to change event date or time
Verify event updates correctly and persists after refresh
Apply filtering to show only leave or shift events
Verify calendar updates to filter events correctly based on selection
Access calendar on a mobile device or emulator
Verify calendar layout optimizes for smaller screens and touch interactions work correctly

title: Notifications Delivery, Priority Tags, and User Filtering
description: Verify the system notification features including priority level tags, read/unread tracking, delivery to correct users, and filtering options.

steps.description: Login as user with notifications
Generate multiple notifications with varying priority levels
Verify notifications display priority tags correctly and ordered by priority
Mark some notifications as read
Verify read/unread status updates in notification list
Apply filters to show only unread or high-priority notifications
Notifications list updates correctly based on filters

title: Excel Import/Export Handling Large Data Sets Without Data Loss
description: Test Excel and CSV import/export utilities with large datasets to ensure correct file format handling, data integrity, and performance.

steps.description: Prepare a large Excel file with valid employee or shift data (1000+ records)
Import the large Excel file via system's import functionality
Verify all records are imported without data loss or corruption
Export data to Excel or CSV format
Verify exported file maintains format consistency and contains expected data
Attempt import with partially corrupted file or data
Check that system reports errors for corrupted rows and prevents invalid entries from importing

title: AI Analysis Feature for Data Anomaly and Naming Similarities
description: Validate the Gemini AI integration to analyze data for inconsistencies, naming similarities, and provide actionable feedback despite API usage limits.

steps.description: Trigger AI analysis on employee names and attendance records
Verify AI returns suggestions highlighting similar names and potential data inconsistencies
Simulate API rate limiting or usage cap
Verify system handles API limits gracefully and informs user appropriately without crashes

title: Security: JWT Authentication and Password Hashing
description: Test authentication workflow using JWT tokens, password hashing via bcryptjs, and access control enforcement on protected routes.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid user credentials
Verify JWT token is issued and stored securely
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Verify login fails with appropriate error without revealing sensitive info
Access protected API endpoints with valid JWT token
Verify access is granted and data is returned
Access protected endpoints with invalid, expired, or missing JWT token
Verify access is denied with status 401 Unauthorized
Verify password is stored hashed and not in plaintext in database

title: Performance Testing Under Normal and Peak Usage
description: Validate system response times and performance of key modules (shift planning, attendance, dashboards) under normal and simulated peak loads including caching and indexing.

steps.description: Perform typical user operations under normal load and measure response times
Verify system meets target response benchmarks
Simulate multiple concurrent users performing read/write actions on shifts, attendance, and dashboard
Ensure application maintains stability without errors and response times remain within acceptable limits
Verify that caching via Redis and database indexing optimizations improve performance metrics

title: API Endpoint Validation, Status Codes, and Error Handling
description: Verify all backend API endpoints return correct HTTP status codes with proper input validation, authentication enforcement, and graceful error handling on both secure and public routes.

steps.description: Call protected API endpoints with valid and invalid JWT tokens
Verify 200 OK responses for valid requests and 401 Unauthorized for invalid or missing tokens
Submit invalid or incomplete data payloads to API endpoints
Verify endpoints return 400 Bad Request with descriptive error messages
Call public API endpoint /public/job-application without authentication
Verify endpoint allows access and performs expected functionality
Simulate backend errors or invalid resource requests
Verify system returns 500 Internal Server Error or 404 Not Found appropriately and logs error details
